member.summary: IF IsNewComboAdd true add new row IF IsNewComboAdd false then check is this item is already added in grid if No then Add new row ELSE then check is this items in combo if not Qty + else count no of comboes in grid if items rows are more than combo count then Qty++ else combo Count = 1 then Qty ++ else add New Row
